Bengaluru: People who have recovered from Covid-19 may have antibodies only for two to three months, said a study published Thursday in Nature Medicine.

articles.author: Asian News International | Posted by: Alfea Jamal
articles.title: Covid-19 pandemic: Depression and anxiety rise among new moms - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Experiencing depression and anxiety during pregnancy and the postpartum period can have detrimental effects on the mental and physical health of both mother and baby that can persist for years.
articles.content: The likelihood of maternal depression and anxiety has substantially increased during the coronavirus crisis, according to a study published in Frontiers in Global Women’s Health. “The social and phys… [+2922 chars]
